name: Color Power
description:
Absorb the power from the Color Orbs to proceed through various levels!

An old little platformer I made a few years ago!

The soundtrack is by Don McGregor!  Check his work out on Bandcamp here.

Explore the rooms in the facility, and run into Color Orbs to gain various abilities.  Green Power lets you change the solidity of certain blocks, and Red Power lets you run through spikes without taking damage!

Also includes a level editor, but there currently is no way to save the data.

Game Controls:

Controller:

Up/down (d-pad): Select menu option

Start/A: Confirmmenu option

Left/right (d-pad): Move

A: Jump

X: Use Color Power

Keyboard:

Up/down: Select menu option

Enter/spacebar: Confirm menu option

Left/right: Move

Space: Jump

Z: Use Color Power

Editor Controls:

Move the mouse around and click the left mouse button to place an object.  Click the right mouse button to delete an object.

Press the spacebar to rotate spikes before you place them.  To change the color of a Color Orb, mouse over it and press the spacebar.

Hold down E to select an object, place the character, and other options in the menu.
